body.name: 500 Pack Cocktail Napkins Paper - Quality 3-Ply White Beverage Napkins - Restaurant, Event, Bar Napkins - Perfect Size Dessert Napkins - Party Napkins Bulk - Elegant Wedding Napkins Disposable
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 17 hrs 58 mins
features: SOFT & ABSORBENT: Tired of thin napkins falling apart when wet? Look no further, Pinnacle Supply napkins are super absorbent and superior to any paper cocktail napkins around. Our napkins are great at soaking up excess condensation from your glass, and will not fall apart when wet.
LINEN-FEEL PREMIUM NAPKINS: Our 3-Ply napkins are made from a high quality material, giving them an elegant linen look & feel, but with the cost effectiveness of disposable paper.

SURFACE PROTECTION: Pinnacle Supply disposable napkins are an inexpensive way to protect your table surface from water rings. When you’re enjoying a cup of coffee or tea, don’t forget to use our napkins to prevent moisture from damaging your table surface.

MULTI-PURPOSE USE: Our cocktail napkins are very versatile, and can be used for numerous things. From setting them under drinks at your fancy events, to wiping your mouth after eating. You can't go wrong with these napkins.

PERFECT SIZE: With a large pack of 500 Napkins at a great price, you'll have more than enough to use for any occasion. Each napkin is a perfect square, measuring 4.75" x 4.75" Folded, and 9.5" x 9.5" Unfolded.
body.description: 🎉 Get Yourself A Pack of Premium Quality Multi-Purpose Cocktail Paper Napkins By Pinnacle Supply – Starting Today!Add a touch of elegance when it matters the most to any of your home gatherings and events, with these premium quality disposable napkins that all your guests will love!🎉 Linen-Look & Highly AbsorbentThese linen-look paper napkins are made from a high quality material, and constructed to soak up any excess condensation from your glass without falling apart.🎉 Elegant and VersatileFrom setting them under drinks at your fancy events, to wiping your mouth after eating. You can't go wrong with these napkins. Pinnacle supply offers high quality, soft, and absorbent napkins that makes your events look elegant. These disposable napkins are high quality and more absorbent than traditional paper napkins.🎉 Perfect SizeWith a large pack of 500 Napkins at a great price, you'll have more than enough to use for any occasion. Each napkin is a perfect square, measuring 4.75" x 4.75" Folded, and 9.5" by 9.5" Unfolded🎉 Order Your Own Large Pack Of Premium Quality Cocktail Napkins By Pinnacle Supply Now – Before Our Supplies Run Out!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 3-ply napkins were great
reviews.reviewText: I own a bartending service, these napkins worked very well for the 300 people crowd! Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice napkins especially for the price
reviews.reviewText: Bought these for my son’s wedding. They were perfect and cost effective

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tons of napkins
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy and great for parties … we had some left over from a formal event of 200 people

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable, 3ply - what's not to love.
reviews.reviewText: Having an event with over a hundred people and wanted napkins for cookie tray. These proved perfect - strong, crisp white, nice edge imprint. I was able to make nice spiral towers from them and they were easy to pick up one or two and move on. Nothing fancy and they are available in multiple colors but standard white is always classy and worked well for our event.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 3 Ply Cocktail Napkins better than 2 Ply
reviews.reviewText: I changed from getting Vanity Fair because they switched from 3 ply to 2 ply. This napkin is 3 ply but is not a soft napkin. It feels like 3 layers of hard paper. I will continue to use these and will update my review if I change my opinion. Right now, I feel this cocktail napkin is serviceable but not as soft as I would have liked. The item was sent quickly and was boxed appropriately so no damage or difficulty in getting napkins out of the box.
